author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add (at least)
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

I've reset the version number to 0.1.0 as the bot recommended (it wasn't really meaningful before anyway) so now this pull request is obsolete, there is a newer one. for some reason it didn't update this one after the version number change
